title: Citi Raises Base Rate
summary: New York – Citibank, N.A. said today it has raised its base lending rate to 7.50% from 7.00%, effective tomorrow, Thursday, December 15, 2022.
tag-2: New York – Citibank, N.A. said today it has raised its base lending rate to 7.50% from 7.00%, effective tomorrow, Thursday, December 15, 2022.
tag-3: CitiCiti is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
tag-4: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Blog: http://blog.citigroup.com | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi.
